description.name: SiteChai
description.tagline: A leading wholesale domain reseller registrar.
description.long:
## Apply for an account
WHMCS users get exclusive access to signup with no setup fees, no minimum deposit commits and preferential pricing.
[Click here to create an account](https://reseller.sitechai.com/reseller.php?action=show_signupform)
features: Ability to View/Change Nameservers & WHOIS Info
Domain Locking, ID Protection, EPP Code Retrieval
